attr.attrdefs: Source: http://www.pacode.com/secure/data/025/chapter93/s93.3.html The Pennsylvania Code website reflects the Pennsylvania Code changes effective through 35 Pa.B. 6882 (December 17, 2005).

edom.edomvds: Source: http://www.pacode.com/secure/data/025/chapter93/s93.3.html The Pennsylvania Code website reflects the Pennsylvania Code changes effective through 35 Pa.B. 6882 (December 17, 2005).
Source: http://www.pacode.com/secure/data/025/chapter93/s93.3.html The Pennsylvania Code website reflects the Pennsylvania Code changes effective through 35 Pa.B. 6882 (December 17, 2005).

attr.attrdefs: Source: http://www.pacode.com/secure/data/025/chapter93/s93.3.html The Pennsylvania Code website reflects the Pennsylvania Code changes effective through 35 Pa.B. 6882 (December 17, 2005).

edom.edomvd: Warm Water Fishes-Maintenance and propagation of fish species and additional flora and fauna which are indigenous to a warm water habitat.
edom.edomvds: Source: http://www.pacode.com/secure/data/025/chapter93/s93.3.html The Pennsylvania Code website reflects the Pennsylvania Code changes effective through 35 Pa.B. 6882 (December 17, 2005).

edom.edomvd: Migratory Fishes-Passage, maintenance and propagation of anadromous and catadromous fishes and other fishes which ascend to flowing waters to complete their life cycle.
edom.edomvds: Source: http://www.pacode.com/secure/data/025/chapter93/s93.3.html The Pennsylvania Code website reflects the Pennsylvania Code changes effective through 35 Pa.B. 6882 (December 17, 2005).

edom.edomvd: Trout Stocking-Maintenance of stocked trout from February 15 to July 31 and maintenance and propagation of fish species and additional flora and fauna which are indigenous to a warm water habitat.
edom.edomvds: Source: http://www.pacode.com/secure/data/025/chapter93/s93.3.html The Pennsylvania Code website reflects the Pennsylvania Code changes effective through 35 Pa.B. 6882 (December 17, 2005).

edom.edomvd: Cold Water Fishes-Maintenance or propagation, or both, of fish species including the family Salmonidae and additional flora and fauna which are indigenous to a cold water habitat.
edom.edomvds: Source: http://www.pacode.com/secure/data/025/chapter93/s93.3.html The Pennsylvania Code website reflects the Pennsylvania Code changes effective through 35 Pa.B. 6882 (December 17, 2005).

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Indicates if stream is visible or a hidden feature such as the centerline of a larger feature

edom.edomvd: Stream centerline of feature wider than 10 feet
Hidden feature (present, but not visible on photography)
